translations: v.友善往来，交往（fraternize 的第三人称单数）：与他人建立友谊或友好关系。
· He fraternizes with people from all walks of life.
他与各行各业的人友好往来。

sentences.sentence: He also called him "The man who fraternizes with foreigners"(T32). As soon as he saw him, Ah Q was sure to swear under his breath.
sentences.translation: 然而阿Q不肯信，偏称他“假洋鬼子”，也叫作“里通外国的人”，一见他，一定在肚子里暗暗的咒骂。
